description: The nerdy kid and the cool kid sitting at a table, gaming together.
text:
Nerdy kid: I'm so excited to compete.
Cool kid: Me too! We're gonna win this thing.

description: The nerdy kid and the cool kid standing in front of a cheering crowd, holding their gaming controllers up in victory.
text:
Nerdy kid: We did it!
Cool kid: We're the champions!

description: The nerdy kid and the cool kid sitting on a bench, looking at the city skyline.
text:
Nerdy kid: This is the best day ever.
Cool kid: I know, right? I couldn't have done it without you.

description: The nerdy kid and the cool kid walking down the street, laughing and talking.
text:
Nerdy kid: So, what do you want to do now?
Cool kid: I don't know. Whatever you want.

description: The nerdy kid and the cool kid sitting on a couch, playing video games together.
text:
Nerdy kid: This is the perfect way to end the day.
Cool kid: I agree. I'm glad we got to spend it together.
